name: Dastardly Finish

sections.text: You can deliver a coup de grace to dazed and staggered non-mythic opponents. In addition, when any creature makes a Fortitude saving throw to survive one of your coup de grace attempts, it takes a penalty to that saving throw equal to your tier.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You strike downed, dazed, and staggered opponents with deadly efficiency.
